name: expert.ru - NoAds
css:
/******************************************************************* 
* File       : expert.ru - NoAds
* Created : 05.07.2015
* License : CC BY-SA
* Author  : Ilya Kashirin aka Seclorum (seclorum@gmail.com)
* Purpose : No ADS
* History 
* Date          Version        Description 
* 05.07.2015	   1.0.0	      	
***********************************************************************/
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("expert.ru") {
body > div[style*="width"],
  *[class*="banner"],
    *[class*="banner"] + hr,
  div[class*="sponsor"],
  a[href*="adriver"],
  div[id*="ban"],
  *[class*="partner"],
  *[class*="partner"] + hr,
  *[class*="advert"],
  *[class*="advert"] + hr,
  div[class*="counters"],
  div[id^="Ya"],
  *[class*="soc-line"],
section.right-box-shadow > figcaption.cutline,
article.box-tags-news > figcaption.cutline
  {
  display: none !important;
}
}
